column1: Smoque BBQ////Ordered on line yesterday and did the pickup ourselves.  For those of you who may be concerned about how difficult it might be to pick up
column2: you don't need to be.  They have a long line right on the side of the building
column3: you pull into the line--no hassle. They walk up to your car
column4: you give them your order number and they're back in 2 shakes of a lambs tail with your order. We ordered the brisket
column5: which was exceptional!!  Ordered 1/2 of baby back and St Louis ribs as well
column6: and they were super.  Got enough sauce so we were happy.
